Title: Rending Daggers
Description:
Forget about them, and forget their BREW. We've got real work to do.

The scroll mentions "rending daggers of the great ones". I've got a feeling I know where to find them.

A pair of mantid lieutenants patrol the Horrid March, to the south. Each one carries a ceremonial dagger.

Bring those daggers back here, $n. We may be on the brink of something big.
ObjectivesText: Obtain the Blade of Kz'Kzik and the Blade of Ilikkax.
CompletionText:
I think I'm starting to understand the next few lines of this prophecy, $n.

Do you have the daggers yet?
RewardText:
These daggers, look!

<Lya holds the blades hilt-to-hilt.>

They were built to fit together! But how to join them...?
